parameters.content: ![](https://i.ibb.co/2Y7j89N0/Screenshot-1949.png)
## Takes raw data and generates ideas for review

## Content Inputs - Inspiration
### Linkedin Profile Scraper - Extract Posts
Pull posts from a specific profile url
[Apify Profile Posts Scraper](https://apify.com/harvestapi/linkedin-profile-posts) ($2.00 per 1k posts inc. engagements) 
2,500 scrapes free on the [Apify free plan](https://apify.com/?fpr=simonscrapes), sign up with code `25SIMON` for 25% off paid plans

  "includeQuotePosts": false,
  "includeReposts": false,
  "scrapeReactions": false,
  "maxReactions": 5,
  "scrapeComments": false,
  "maxComments": 5
}

parameters.text:
=# Inputs
* **Source Content:**
    * Type of Source Content: `{{ $json.Type }}`
    * Source date: `{{ $json['Source Date'] ? $json['Source Date'].toDateTime().format('yyyy-MM-dd') : "not found" }}`
    * Source Title (if applicable e.g. Video): `{{ $json['Source Title'] }}`
    * Content: 
`{{ $json['Source Content'] }}`
    * Asset (e.g. image url): 
`{{ $json['Source Asset'] }}`
    * Asset text (e.g. text from image): 
`{{ $json['Source Asset Text'] }}`
    * Additional research (optional):
`{{ $json['Research (Output)'] }}`
    * Idea Hooks (use as inspiration if included):
`{{ $json['Idea'] }}`

* **Brand Details:**
    * Brand Name:
`{{ $json['Brand Name'] }}`
    * Brand Colors:
`{{ $json['Brand Color'] }}`
    * Brand Voice: 
`{{ $json['Brand Voice'] }}`
    * Product Info: 
`{{ $json.Product }}`
    * Custom Instructions: 
`{{ $json['Custom Instructions'] }}`
    * CTA Text:
`{{ $json['CTA Text'] }}`

* **Creative Inputs:**
    * Visual Philosophy (name): 
`{{ $json['Style Name'] }}`
    * Design Style: 
`{{ $json['Design Style'] }}`

* Generate exactly **{{ $json['Number of Drafts'] ? $json['Number of Drafts'] : 1 }}** creative variations**.

parameters.content:
## Single Images
Pull image text and download image

## Carousels
Pull individual image text and download individual images

## Batching 
To not overload memory
## Live engagement Stats

### Helper
Run to get Postiz channel id

## Infographic or Image
- Uploads any files first
- Links new post to a file

### Helper
If you struggle installing the Postiz community node, use these http requests with updated data

## Plain Text (no assets)
- Plain text post body

## Carousels
- Individual carousel images uploaded and combined

## Post to Socials
- Right now, it assumes you want to post it to LinkedIn
- We use a paid account (Postiz.com)
- If you are using n8n Cloud it should be fairly easy to set this up using the Linkedin node directly to connect to your personal account
## Scrape Linkedin

## How to add a new input source
**_That then feeds into the idea generation flow_**
1. Duplicate the ` [New Input Template]` table in Airtable - add fields to this duplicate, do not delete any of the existing fields. This is the new input table e.g. `podcasts`
2. Update the button clicks in Airtable:
"`ContentFlowWebhook Address`" &
"?table_url=" & "`airtable url of new table`" &
"&record_id="& RECORD_ID() &
"&path="& "generate-draft-post" &
"&origin="& "`podcast or other shortname`"
3. Update the `InputTableUrls` node with the new table shortname e.g. 'news' and table url
4. To generate posts from this, you'll need to standardize the content inputs after the `InputSwitch` node, by copying the SetFields node and mapping your new inputs to the assets, text etc.
4. Add a column to the ideas table in Airtable called `Link-shortname` e.g. `Link-podcast`

## Content Inputs - Own Ideas
### Takes a seed of an idea and fleshes it out with research

parameters.initialMessages:
Hi there! 
I'm a social post ideas agent. Tell me about the idea you'd like to post. I'll help you generate it in more detail and add it back to your ideas table.

parameters.content:
## Helps pick an idea angle
Continues to ask questions until you confirm a direction of the idea

## Once idea confirmed, add to database
Frames and formats the idea consistently with all other input sources
## V4 - New Input Source
## Generate Research Reports

## Perform idea research
Standard or deep

parameters.text:
=Context: Today is {{ $now.format('DD') }}. You are scanning for events from the last 72 hours  - *Logic:* `after:{{ $now.minus(3, 'days').format('DD') }}`

Topics to search: `{{ $('Search News Topics').item.json['Topics To Search'] }}`

Negative Syntax: `-{{ $('Search News Topics').item.json['Negative Search Terms'] }}`

parameters.content:
## Per brand
Loop and find news on topics and subtopics
## V4 - New Input Source

- Add news sources to check from (businessinsider, https://www.saastr.com/)
- Add a news article link directly
- Podcasts as a source?

## Webhook Input
Dynamically determines which subworkflow to start

## If from `ideas` table
Find source info and pass back through InputSwitch to create draft post (i.e. always process the underlying source input, not the idea itself

## Update
With inputs and table urls
